name: Mirror Mantis
components: S, F (a hand mirror stained with a dried drop of blood)
text: Whenever the target of this spell looks into a mirror or other reflective surface where it can see its own visage clearly, it sees a Red Mantis assassin (in full armor, face hidden by a mantis mask) looking back at it. The reflection is harmless and mimics the target’s motions perfectly; no one else can see this illusion. The first time the target sees the Red Mantis reflection, it must succeed at a Will save be or shaken and take a –2 penalty on saves against fear effects for as long as it can see the altered image and for 3 rounds thereafter. A new save must be attempted each time the creature views its reflection during the spell’s duration. Once a creature successfully saves, it becomes immune to being shaken by the caster’s mirror mantis spell for 24 hours, though it will still see the Red Mantis reflection until the spell ends.
components_zh: 姿势，器材（表面被血渍污染的手镜）
text_zh: 每当该法术的目标看向镜面或者其他反光的表面，而且能够清楚地看到自己的容貌时，他会看到红螳螂刺客（这名刺客全副武装，面部被螳螂面罩所遮盖）在镜中与自己对视。这种映像是无害的，且映像会完美模仿目标的动作; 而其他人则无法看到这些幻象。目标初次看到红螳螂的映像时，必须进行1次意志豁免，若豁免失败，那么目标在看到镜中被改变的映像之时以及看到映像后的3轮内，均会陷入颤栗（Shaken），而且还会在对抗恐惧（fear）效果的豁免中承受-2减值。在法术的持续时间内，目标每逢看到映像，就必须尝试1次新的豁免。当该生物成功通过豁免时，它就会在24小时内免疫该施法者的螳螂镜影所带来的颤栗效果，但是直至法术结束为止，它在镜中看到的仍旧会是红螳螂的映像。
